rukus.text: 12|2|Niscaya amara eta nayila karechi [1] kura'ana hisebe arabi bhasaya, yate tomara bujhate paro [2].
12|3|Amara apanara kache uttama kahini barnana karachi [1], ohira madhyame apanara kache e kura'ana pathiye; yadi'o era age apani chilena anabahitadera antarbhukta [2].
12|4|Smarana karuna, yakhana ‘i'usupha tara pitake balechilena, ‘he amara pita! Ami to dekhechi egara naksatra, surya ebam camdake, dekhechi taderake amara prati sijdabanata abasthaya [1].’
12|5|Tini balalena, ‘he amara batsa! Tomara sbapnera katha tomara bha'idera kache balo na [1]; balale tamra tomara birud'dhe gabhira sarayantra karabe [2]. Sayatana to manusera prakasya satru [3].

12|6|Ara ebhabe apanara raba apanake manonita karabena ebam apanake sbapnera byakhya [1] siksa debena [2] ebam apanara prati o iya’kubera paribara parijanadera upara tamra anugraha purna karabena [3], yebhabe tini eta age purna karechilena apanara pitr-purusa ibarahima o isahakera upara [4]. Niscaya apanara raba sarbajna, prajnamaya [5].
